body_html: Maybe you could have a look at https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/autograd/python_variable_indexing.cpp#L188 ? It initializes the index tensor used in tensor.index. Let me know if you don't manage to use it, I'm typing from my phone now
